title: Small freeze when I ALT + TAB
body:
I have recently witnessed that sometimes when I ALT + TAB my league just freezes for like 2-5 seconds. It haven't happened before but just in like weeks it has started happening. I run my League at borderless mode and at 1920 x 1080 resolution

My PC specs: 
Nvidia GTX 1070
Intel Core i5-6400
HyperX 8x2 GB DDR4 Memory

replies.body:
When you alt + tab your computer essentially needs to pause what it was displaying, clear itself of what it was rendering, and then begin rendering whatever it was that you're switching to. If you have a lot of windows or programs running in the background, this process can sometimes 'hiccup' and freeze for a moment. 

My best advice would be to try and play without as much stuff running in the background and see if that helps out at all.
